text:
Jericho is an American action-drama television series. It's about life after a nuclear attack on 23 American cities. It takes place in the fictional town of Jericho, Kansas. It started on September 20, 2006, and it ended on March 25, 2008. It was on CBS. It was shown in 30 countries.
It was cancelled after one season. Fans asked the network to bring it back. They did, but it was cancelled again.
DVD releases.
CBS DVD & Paramount Home Entertainment have made both seasons on DVD in Regions 1, 2 & 4.
On June 5, 2018, CBS re-released the complete series set on DVD in Region 1.
